headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  EINBENDER, ALVIN H

snippet: EINBENDER--Alvin H. The Board of Trustees and staff of Carnegie Hall celebrate the life of our friend and former colleague, Alvin H. Einbender. Alvin served as a Carnegie Hall Trustee from 1986 to 1992 with grace and distinction. He will be remembered by all of us at Carnegie Hall not only for his remarkable business acumen, but also for his tremendous kindness. We express our heartfelt condolences to his beloved wife, Joan, and their four children, Alison, Jay, Gail and Karen. Robert F. Smith, Chairman; Sanford I. Weill, President; Clive Gillinson, Executive and Artistic Director 1/3
